title: Integrating MR radiomics and dynamic hematological factors predicts pathological response to neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy in esophageal cancer
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Yunsong Liu, Zeliang Ma, Yongxing Bao, Xin Wang, Yu Men, Xujie Sun, Feng Ye, Kuo Men, Jianjun Qin, Nan Bi, Liyan Xue, Zhouguang Hui
